entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Fort McMurray
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:39 AM MST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, -27.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fort McMurray Airport 11:00 AM MST Thursday 02 February 2023
Condition: Sunny
Temperature: -27.0°C
Pressure: 103.3 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 68 %
Wind Chill: -38
Dewpoint: -31.1°C
Wind: ESE 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday: Light snow. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Light snow beginning this afternoon. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 43 this morning and minus 32 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 15 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Temperature rising to minus 15 by morning. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Snow ending early in the morning then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 02 February 2023
